DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine the effectiveness of the PresVIEW Scleral Implant to improve near vision in patients who require reading glasses.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of the PresView Implant for the Improvement of Near Vision in Patients With Presbyopia
DOC.criteria: Subject must be between 5060 years old Subject must have a best corrected distance visual acuity of 20/20 or better Subject must be mentally competent to understand and comply with the requirements of the study. Any previous eye surgeries including cataract, LASIK, or Muscle surgery Any chronic systemic diseases such as diabetes, heart disease, Lupus, etc. Any eye diseases such as eye inflammation, infection, cataract, or retinal diseases
